      Classes in org.daisy.common.messaging that implement MessageAppender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MessageBus
      Collection of messages that belong together, for example to a Pipeline job.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageAppender MessageAppender.append(MessageBuilder message)
      Append a child to the underlying message.

      MessageAppender MessageBuilder.build() 
      static MessageAppender MessageAppender.getActiveBlock()
      Returns the "active" block in the current "message thread".
      static MessageAppender MessageAppender.getActiveBlock(String threadId)
      Returns the active block in the specified message thread.
